title: Priyank Kharge vs RSS: Karnataka Minister posts video of threat call from unidentified man

content: A.R.K. Colony, I think, is the only public marker commemorating S. Anantharamakrishnan ‚Äì the man who set Madras on its journey to becoming an auto major

content: Paying tributes to Mr. Naik, Goa CM Pramod Sawant said his leadership, humility and contribution to the public welfare will always be remembered

content: This development assumes significance in light of concerns flagged by environmentalists on the pollution and the deterioration of water quality of the river Ganga particularly in West Bengal, especially due to untreated drainage and sewage water

content: A new study has traced microplastic contamination in commercial fish, factors that increase the uptake of of these toxic particles, and the resulting risks for fish and human health along the Goan coast

content: The long-pending matter raises concerns over stagnation in career progression and disparities in pay and promotional opportunities among officers in the subordinate judiciary.

content: The PM highlights common Buddhist bonds between Mongolia and India and says India will start issuing free e-visas for Mongolian citizens

content: According to a press release, the team was started to mark World Thrombosis Day, observed annually on October 13, and a global awareness campaign initiated by the International Society on Thrombosis and Haemostasis (ISTH) in 2014.

content: JD(U) MP Ajay Kumar Mandal offers to resign while MLA Gopal Mandal sits in protest, both claiming that they are not allowed to meet Chief Minister Nitish Kumar; three leaders file nomination even before party releases candidate list; however, party working president Sanjay Jha says ‚Äòall is well‚Äô within the NDA.

content: The initiative aims to protect vital wetlands, promote eco-tourism, safeguard rare species, and secure international recognition, showcasing Andhra Pradesh‚Äôs commitment to environmental conservation, he says

title: Kerala school hijab row: Student set to resume classes after parents agree to follow school dress code
content: Parents have decided to adhere to the school‚Äôs dress code. The private school in Kochi had earlier declared a two-day holiday after tensions arose following its decision not to let the girl attend classes wearing a hijab

title: Yamamoto follows Snell with rare feat in L.A. win
content: Yoshinobu Yamamoto pitched a three-hitter for the first postseason complete game in eight years as the Dodgers beat Milwaukee 5-1 on Tuesday night to extend their lead in the National League Championship Series.

title: Calipari: Will retire before becoming 'transactional'
content: John Calipari has no plans to leave college basketball but said if he can no longer build relationships with players and do that job the way he wants, he'll exit the sport.

title: Trump threatens to remove WC games from Boston
content: President Donald Trump threatened on Tuesday to revoke Boston's World Cup matches if local authorities don't get tougher on crime.

title: Sources: USC, U-M question Big Ten capital deal
content: Trustees at Michigan and USC questioned the Big Ten's proposed $2B-plus private capital deal, with one sticking point during a Tuesday call being it doesn't address the root issue -- soaring costs -- that has made the need for cash so imperative.

title: Pulisic subbed off early in U.S. win over Australia
content: Christian Pulisic was subbed out in the first half due to a hamstring injury in the United States victory against Australia at Dick's Sporting Goods Park on Tuesday.

title: Source: Bregman set to opt out of Red Sox deal
content: Alex Bregman plans to opt out of his contract with the Red Sox, the New York Post first reported Tuesday night.

title: Mavs sign Kidd to multiyear contract extension
content: The Mavericks signed coach Jason Kidd to an extension in the wake of the Knicks' interest in hiring him over the summer.

title: Skaggs' lawyer: Angels to blame for fatal overdose
content: A lawyer for Tyler Skaggs' family argued the Angels should be held responsible for his drug overdose death, while a team attorney said they were not aware of Skaggs' drug issues.

content: Meet the team of part-timers, ranked 150 by FIFA, hoping to reach next summer's tournament. "Every young boy wants to play in a World Cup, it is a dream... and we know we have a chance."

content: The longtime Miami Heat coach is obsessed with what he calls the "purity" of competition. It's why he was the obvious successor to lead Team USA.

content: Many Week 6 fantasy outcomes were determined Monday night, with a pair of Falcons playing starring roles.

content: The Atlanta Falcons running back said interacting with James is extra special because the longtime NBA star is his favorite athlete.

content: Media covering the Celtics were set to play a pickup game on Tuesday before Mazzulla had other plans.

content: What lines offered immediate value once odds came out? Here are five early bets and a futures wager to track.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Neymar eyeing shock return to Europe
content: Santos forward Neymar is open to a move to Serie A amid links to Inter Milan and Napoli. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: Report Calls Justin Trudeau Dating Katy Perry "A Bit Of Mid-Life Crisis"
content: Former Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau's romance with pop superstar Katy Perry is a "midlife crisis" following the end of his marriage, a Canadian society source said.

title: India Has About 22,446 Wild Elephants, Shows First DNA-Based Census
content: India's wild elephant population stands at 22,446, according to the latest All-India Synchronous Elephant Estimation (SAIEE) 2025, released by the Wildlife Institute of India (WII) on Tuesday.

title: Adani Group Constructing Ropeway To Make Kedarnath Dham Darshan Easier
content: The Adani Group is constructing a ropeway to facilitate devotees visiting the Kedarnath Dham with easier access to darshan, said Chairman Gautam Adani on Wednesday.

title: Bengaluru Citizens Say Won't Pay Tax Over "Poor Infra", DK Shivakumar Responds
content: Karnataka Deputy Chief Minister DK Shivakumar on Wednesday said the work of filling potholes in Bengaluru is "progressing swiftly", even as a group of citizens threatened to stop paying property tax.

title: "Since Crackers Smuggled In...": Why Supreme Court Gave Big Go-Ahead
content: Firecrackers smuggled in from outside Delhi NCR during Diwali cause more damage than green crackers, the Supreme Court said today, while allowing the bursting of green crackers in Delhi between October 18 and 21.

title: Green Crackers Allowed In Delhi On Diwali By Supreme Court, With Conditions
content: The Supreme Court has cleared the use and sale of green crackers on Diwali in Delhi and neighbouring cities, relaxing a blanket cracker ban in a capital left struggling with severe pollution every winter.

title: Class 10 Student in Madurai, A Trained Rifle Shooter, Dies By Suicide
content: A Class 10 student in Tamil Nadu's Madurai district has died by suicide at his residence. Investigators said that the boy was a trained rifle shooter and is suspected to have used a firearm to end his life.

title: 20 Killed As Brand New Bus Catches Fire On Rajasthan Highway
content: At least 20 people were killed when a private bus travelling from Jaisalmer to Jodhpur in Rajasthan caught fire on Tuesday, the police said.

title: Massive Jam On Mumbai-Ahmedabad Highway, 500 Students Stuck For 12 Hours
content: A massive traffic jam on the Mumbai-Ahmedabad National Highway in Maharashtra's Palghar district stranded more than 500 students and commuters for nearly 12 hours, officials said on Wednesday.

title: Delhi's Air Quality Remains 'Poor' As Temperature Settles Below Normal
content: The air quality in the national capital was recorded in the 'poor category' for the second consecutive day on Wednesday morning, with an Air Quality Index (AQI) reading of 210.

title: "BRICS An Attack On Dollar": Trump Claims US Tariffs Made Nations Leave Bloc
content: US President Donald Trump has defended his tariff policy against BRICS members, claiming the bloc was "an attack on the dollar".

title: "I'm Being Followed": Sonam Wangchuk's Wife To Supreme Court
content: Ladakh statehood activist Sonam Wangchuk's wife, Gitanjali Angmo, has claimed that she has been followed and is under constant surveillance ever since she arrived in Delhi after her husband's arrest for provoking protesters and alleged Pakistan links

title: Britain Is Ill-Prepared For Extreme Weather, Warn Climate Advisers
content: Britain must urgently prepare for global warming of at least 2 degrees Celsius above pre-industrial levels by 2050, its climate advisers said on Wednesday, warning the country is ill-prepared for extreme weather that is already occurring.

title: Netflix To Add Spotify's Most Popular Video Podcasts By Early 2026
content: Netflix said on Tuesday it will add a slate of Spotify's most popular video podcasts to its service from early 2026, part of a new distribution partnership aimed at broadening the streaming giant's entertainment lineup and drawing new audiences.

title: Cops Rule Out Gang Rape Of Durgapur Medical Student, Arrest Her Friend
content: The friend of the medical student who was raped near a private medical college in West Bengal's Durgapur has been arrested by the police, taking the total arrests in the case to six.

title: India Elected To UN Human Rights Council For 7th Time
content: India has been elected to the United Nations Human Rights Council (UNHRC) for the 2026-28 term, marking the country's seventh stint on the Geneva-based rights body.

title: Hamas Launches Crackdown In Gaza, Executes Alleged Collaborators
content: Hamas tightened its grip on Gaza's ruined cities Tuesday, launching a crackdown and executing alleged collaborators, even as US President Donald Trump vowed to disarm the group.

title: "Punched Me, Touched My Chest": Minor Accuses Gurukul Head Of Sexual Assault
content: Bhagwan Kokare Maharaj, head of Warkari Gurukul in Maharashtra's Ratnagiri is accused of molesting a minor female student.

title: Haryana IPS Officer Suicide Case: Family Gives Consent For Autopsy
content: Ending impasse over the autopsy of Haryana IPS officer Y Puran Kumar, who allegedly committed suicide here on October 7, his family has given consent to conduct post-mortem of the deceased, a police official said on Wednesday.

title: ‚ÄòAllowed only from Oct 18-21‚Äô: SC permits green crackers in Delhi-NCR for Diwali; sets time slots
content: The Supreme Court has permitted the use of green crackers in Delhi and NCR between October 15th and 25th, exclusively at designated locations for Diwali celebrations. Additionally, firecrackers can be burst for one hour in the morning (6-7 am) and two hours in the evening (8-10 pm) on Diwali day.

title: 'I will not contest Bihar polls': Prashant Kishor claims NDA in 'complete chaos'
content: Poll strategist-turned-politician Prashant Kishor will not contest the upcoming Bihar assembly polls, stating the decision was made for the "greater good" of his Jan Suraaj party.  He believes his absence will allow him to focus on organizational work, and remains confident of a significant electoral outcome, either a landslide victory or a substantial defeat.

title: 'Military post, tanks destroyed' : Pak troops, Taliban forces clash again; new visuals emerge
content: Fresh clashes erupted between Pakistan and Afghanistan in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, with Pakistan accusing Afghan troops of unprovoked firing. Pakistani forces reportedly repulsed the attack, damaging Afghan tanks and military posts. This marks the second exchange of fire this week, with border crossings remaining closed and tensions escalating over alleged territorial violations and militant hideouts.

title: Sultan of Johor Cup: After no handshakes in cricket, India, Pak exchange high 5s - watch video
content: Indian junior hockey players showcased sportsmanship, exchanging greetings with Pakistani counterparts at the Sultan of Johor Cup, a stark contrast to recent cricket team "no handshake" incidents. Despite political tensions, the U-21 hockey teams shared high fives, highlighting a different spirit. The hockey match itself was a thrilling 3-3 draw, with India maintaining their unbeaten streak.

title: Gold rate prediction: Will prices continue to rise this week? Check outlook
content: Gold price prediction today: Gold prices are poised to potentially surpass $4,200 this week amidst renewed US-China trade tensions and expectations of further US Federal Reserve rate cuts. Despite a strong eight-week rally, downside risks and volatility persist.

title: Amazon fires engineer: Sent threatening letter to CEO; HR details emerge
content: Amazon fired Palestinian software engineer Ahmed Shahrour after he protested the company's $1.2 billion Project Nimbus contract with Israel on internal Slack channels. The termination follows a five-week suspension, with Amazon citing policy violations for posting non-work-related messages about the Israel-Palestine conflict. Shahrour claims the firing is retaliation against Palestinian voices.

title: Bihar polls: Cracks appear in NDA over seat-sharing; RLM's Kushwaha says 'nothing is well'
content: Discontent brews within Bihar's NDA over seat-sharing for upcoming assembly polls. Allies like Upendra Kushwaha and Jitan Ram Manjhi express dissatisfaction, with HAM even announcing plans to contest against Chirag Paswan's LJP. BJP leaders maintain alliance strength, while the opposition Mahagathbandhan criticizes the BJP's intentions.

title: $300m deal: In a first, France's firm eyes India for LNG-powered container ships
content: French shipping giant CMA CGM is eyeing India as a hub for constructing small, LNG-powered container vessels, signing a letter of intent for six ships worth $300 million. This historic deal, following discussions with Prime Minister Modi, marks India's first container ship order from a global mainline operator.

title: US revokes visas of 6 foreigners for Charlie Kirk murder 'celebration'
content: The US State Department revoked visas for six foreigners from Argentina, Brazil, Germany, Mexico, Paraguay, and South Africa for celebrating the assassination of conservative activist Charlie Kirk, an ally of President Donald Trump. This action follows Kirk's killing on September 10, with the State Department vowing to remove "aliens" who celebrate the death of Americans and take advantage of US hospitality.

title: AI bubble: Zoho founder warns; 'Current investments driven by hype, not fundamentals'
content: Zoho founder Sridhar Vembu voiced concerns about the current AI investment surge, calling it a 'financial bubble' that could hinder long-term innovation. He highlighted speculative funding and inflated valuations, similar to past tech booms. Despite these worries, Vembu affirmed AI's underlying value, advocating for measured, purpose-driven investment over hype.

title: ‚ÄòBrics was an attack on dollar‚Äô: Trump explains why he imposed tariffs
content: US President Donald Trump has renewed his tariff threats against Brics, alleging the bloc is "against the dollar" and claiming nations are withdrawing. India, meanwhile, advocates for multilateralism, potentially creating friction with the US. Trump views BRICS' expansion as a direct threat to the dollar's global standing, vowing hefty tariffs on member nations.

title: Illegally kept secret docs, met Chinese officials: Indian-origin US expert arrested ‚Äî what we know
content: An Indian-origin Pentagon contractor and State Department adviser, Ashley Tellis, faces charges for allegedly removing classified Air Force documents. Court records reveal Tellis met extensively with Chinese government officials, discussing sensitive topics like emerging technologies. He is charged with unlawful retention of national defense information, a serious offense with potential prison time and fines.

title: Early detection of prostate cancer could save lives, says Rishi Sunak
content: Former UK Prime Minister Rishi Sunak champions early prostate cancer detection, urging high-risk men, especially Black men and those with a family history, to undergo targeted screening. He emphasizes that proactive checks using MRI scans, PSA tests, and biopsies can lead to effective treatment and prevent unnecessary deaths, encouraging men not to delay seeking medical advice.

title: Digital rights debate: SC rejects doctor‚Äôs WhatsApp plea; suggests using Zoho‚Äôs Arattai
content: The Supreme Court of India has ruled that access to private messaging platforms like WhatsApp is not a fundamental right, dismissing a doctor's petition to restore her blocked account. The court suggested using alternative apps like Zoho's Arattai, emphasizing users must comply with private platform policies.

title: 'Impossible to fake energy': Musk reverses stance, backs Bitcoin ‚Äî What he said
content: Elon Musk has once again highlighted Bitcoin's energy-backed foundation, contrasting it with easily debased fiat currencies.  This aligns with his long-held view of Bitcoin's intrinsic value.  Despite past environmental concerns with Tesla accepting Bitcoin, both Tesla and SpaceX reportedly hold significant Bitcoin reserves, suggesting continued faith in the cryptocurrency's potential amidst market fluctuations.

title: ‚ÄòSacrificing self to awaken people‚Äô: Another Haryana cop dies by suicide; blames system
content: Another Haryana policeman, ASI Sandeep Kumar, died by suicide, echoing the recent death of IPS officer Y Puran Kumar. Sandeep, who investigated Puran Kumar for corruption, alleged in a note and video that the IPS officer was corrupt and used his influence to cover up wrongdoing.

title: IND vs AUS: Kohli, Rohit depart with team India for Australia white-ball series - Watch
content: India's cricket stars Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli are back for the Australian white-ball tour, with Shubman Gill now leading the ODI side. This marks a significant leadership transition as the team gears up for future tournaments. Key players have departed for the series, which includes three ODIs and five T20Is.

title: Stock market today: Nifty50 opens above 25,200; Sensex up around 300 points
content: Stock market today: Nifty50 and BSE Sensex, the Indian equity benchmark indices, opened in green on Wednesday. While Nifty50 was above 25,200, BSE Sensex was up almost 300 points.

title: ‚ÄòThis was scary‚Äô: Travis Kelce‚Äôs head-first fall vs Lions sparks concussion fears
content: Travis Kelce's scary head-first fall during the Chiefs' 30-17 win over the Lions sparked fan concern, with many questioning the lack of immediate concussion evaluation. Despite the alarming incident, Kelce played on, later focusing on the team's tough victory rather than his own safety.

title: Rare earth curbs: US calls India key ally in 'China vs world' battle
content: US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent accused China of "provocative" economic moves after Beijing tightened rare earth mineral export controls. He stated the US and allies will respond collectively to China's "weaponization" of its dominance in these vital materials, asserting sovereignty and de-risking supply chains.

title: Stock recommendations for October 15 - check list
content: Stock market recommendations: Anand Rathi's Mehul Kothari recommends Premier Energies, SKF India, and JSW Infra for investment today. Premier Energies shows a symmetrical triangle breakout, SKF India a bullish inverse head and shoulder pattern, and JSW Infra a support reversal near its 200-DEMA, indicating potential upside.

title: 'Like Abhishek Sharma': Yashasvi Jaiswal on his path to 'daddy hundreds'
content: Yashasvi Jaiswal's exceptional Test scores are drawing praise from cricket legends. His dedication and hard work are key to his success. Jaiswal's ability to convert fifties into hundreds is noteworthy. He has set high standards for himself and continues to impress with his consistent performances. His journey reflects immense sacrifice and a strong work ethic.

title: Trump considering terminating business with China; threatens to end cooking oil trade
content: President Trump accused China of "purposefully" halting soybean purchases, labeling it an "economically hostile act." He stated the US is considering trade termination with Beijing as retribution, emphasizing domestic cooking oil production capabilities. This move follows China's previous use of trade leverage, impacting American soybean farmers.

title: 'Disappointed with Putin': Trump slams Russian President over Ukraine war
content: US President Donald Trump expressed disappointment with Russian President Vladimir Putin over the ongoing war in Ukraine, calling it the most significant event since World War II in terms of casualties. Trump stated he had a good relationship with Putin and questioned why the war continues, noting its negative impact on Russia and its prolonged duration.

title: 3 kids among 20 charred to death after Jodhpur-bound bus catches fire, 15 critical
content: Tragedy struck near Jaisalmer as a bus fire claimed 20 lives, including three children, and critically injured 15. A suspected AC short circuit is believed to have ignited the inferno. Rescue efforts were delayed due to the intense heat of the vehicle.  The nation mourns this devastating loss.

title: 'Shouldn‚Äôt fear selectors': Rahane drops bombshell; shots fired at Agarkar‚Äôs selection committee
content: Ajinkya Rahane advocates for recent retirees to become domestic cricket selectors, believing their understanding of modern T20 and IPL styles is crucial. He stressed that selectors should match the evolving game's pace, enabling players to perform fearlessly. Cheteshwar Pujara offered a more nuanced view, acknowledging the benefits but not excluding experienced former players.

title: 'Google for DNA': Scientists create the world's fastest genetic search engine
content: Scientists at ETH Zurich have unveiled MetaGraph, a revolutionary tool dubbed 'Google for DNA'. This innovation allows rapid searches across vast genetic databases, overcoming the slow, resource-intensive methods previously used.  MetaGraph's compressed index promises to accelerate research into diseases, antibiotic resistance, and rare genetic conditions, making genetic exploration faster and more comprehensive.

title: US targets suspected drug-terror vessel off Venezuela; six killed in strike, Trump says ‚Äî Watch
content: President Trump announced a lethal strike off the coast of Venezuela, killing six individuals on a vessel affiliated with a "Designated Terrorist Organization" allegedly involved in narcotrafficking. The strike, ordered by the Secretary of War, occurred in international waters and marks the fifth fatal operation in the Caribbean under the administration's policy of treating drug traffickers as unlawful combatants.

title: MLB trade rumour: Red Sox target $80m Phillies star for offence boost
content: Boston Red Sox are eyeing a reunion with powerful free agent Kyle Schwarber, a former fan favorite. A potential sign-and-trade could send outfielder Jarren Duran and a pitching prospect to Philadelphia. This move would inject much-needed power into Boston's lineup and offer the Phillies financial flexibility and defensive upgrades, creating a win-win scenario for both clubs.

title: Grammy-winning R&B singer D'Angelo passes away at 51
content: The world mourns the loss of D'Angelo, the Grammy-winning R&B artist whose haunting melodies and rich lyrical storytelling redefined neo-soul. At just 51, he succumbed to cancer, leaving behind a memorable catalog that includes classics like 'Untitled (How Does It Feel)' and 'Brown Sugar.' A beloved father, his influence resonates through generations of musicians and fans alike.

title: 'The problem in India' ‚Äì R Ashwin makes explosive claim; backs Virat Kohli‚Äôs vision
content: Ravichandran Ashwin has echoed Virat Kohli's 2019 call for standard Test centres in India, emphasizing player familiarity and consistent pitch conditions over crowd attendance. Ashwin argued that varying regional pitches, particularly the lack of bounce in eastern India, create ordinary Test match conditions and dilute the home advantage.

title: Did Mahomes boycott Bad Bunny for Charlie Kirk? Truth explained
content: Viral claims that Patrick Mahomes would boycott the 2026 Super Bowl over Bad Bunny's halftime show and join Turning Point USA are false. Mahomes has made no such statements regarding Bad Bunny or the political group. His wife, Brittany, made a general comment about hate after Charlie Kirk's death, but Mahomes himself remains apolitical.

title: Rebecca J fires back at Offset with claim about Stefon Diggs, Cardi B
content: Rapper Offset faced backlash after implying Instagram model Rebecca J pursued him. Rebecca J responded strongly, calling Offset's actions embarrassing and defending Cardi B. She praised Cardi as self-made and referenced NFL player Stefon Diggs in a viral comment. The internet reacted to Rebecca J's defense and sharp retort, highlighting her confidence and willingness to respond.

title: Mark Sanchez case takes twist as judge steps down amid stabbing probe
content: Former NFL quarterback Mark Sanchez is stable after being stabbed in an Indianapolis altercation with a truck driver who claimed self-defense. The incident, which occurred near a loading dock, has led to a lawsuit filed by the truck driver against Sanchez and Fox Sports. A judge has also recused herself from the criminal case.

title: Low magnesium: The silent cause behind your poor sleep, anxiety and fatigue
content: Millions of people worldwide struggle with low magnesium, often without realizing it. The deficiency can lead to poor sleep, anxiety, and fatigue. It‚Äôs one of the most overlooked nutrients today.

title: Jack Roslovic reportedly lost nearly $10M before signing with Oilers
content: Jack Roslovic rejected a significant three-year offer from the Edmonton Oilers. He sought a more lucrative deal elsewhere but remained unsigned for months. The Oilers later offered a one-year contract. Roslovic now aims to impress this season to secure a better deal next summer. This situation highlights the unpredictable nature of NHL contracts.

title: Did Travis Kelce really sue Karoline Leavitt for $50M? Truth behind viral claim
content: Viral social media posts falsely claimed Kansas City Chiefs star Travis Kelce filed a $50 million lawsuit against White House press secretary Karoline Leavitt. Fact-checks by multiple outlets, including Snopes and Reuters, confirmed no such lawsuit or live TV confrontation occurred. The fabricated story aimed to generate clicks through fake celebrity and political news.

title: Trump awards Presidential Medal of Freedom to Charlie Kirk- watch
content: At TOI World Desk, our dedicated team of seasoned journalists and passionate writers tirelessly sifts through the vast tapestry of global events to bring you the latest news and diverse perspectives round the clock. With an unwavering commitment to accuracy, depth, and timeliness, we strive to keep you informed about the ever-evolving world, delivering a nuanced understanding of international affairs to our readers. Join us on a journey across continents as we unravel the stories that shape our interconnected world. Read More

title: Our 10-team points league mock draft: Where did SGA, Curry, Flagg go?
content: the fantasy basketball experts got together for another mock draft using a 10-team head-to-head points format . the participants were Eric Moody, Joe Kaiser, Steve Alexander, Andre' Snellings, Michael Schwartz, Tom Carpenter, Jim McCormick, Eric Karabell and Pierre Becquey .

title: Russia India‚Äôs top oil supplier: Moscow accounts for 34% of shipments in Sept; 10% dip in 2025
content: india‚Äôs crude imports in Sept at more than 4.5 million bpd (barrels per day) . this is an increase of 70,000 barrels over Aug, but flat when compared to the year-ago period . shipments have seen a drop of 180,000 from the average volumes imported during the first eight months .

title: Soaring silver price takes sheen off Diwali sweets as traders skimp on foil
content: the price of a silver varakh has gone up to Rs 8 from Rs 5 last Diwali . it's a bittersweet moment for shops as it comes amid cheer over reduction in GST on sweets to 5% . the cost of the sweets it buys has shot up 10-15% .

title: Opening night or late-season debuts? Key NBA superstar injury returns to watch for
content: a week away from opening tipoff for the 2025-26 season . a few familiar faces and some new ones ready to take the court starting Oct. 21 . leBron James is expected to sit out three to four weeks .

title: Battle of Bihar: 3 days left to file Phase 1 papers; opposition yet to finalise seat deal
content: Manoj Chaurasia is a senior political journalist having experience of working for top national and international media in a career spanning over 25 years. He loves writing political, offbeat and human-interest stories. Read More

title: Only Hindu temple in East England to close: Council puts building on sale; community fears loss
content: the Bharat Hindu Samaj Temple was established in the new England complex in Peterborough in 1984 . it serves 13,500 Hindus in Cambridgeshire, Norfolk and parts of Lincolnshire . the temple put in its bid by the deadline of Monday night to buy the entire complex of seven units .

title: Jumbo fall: India's Elephant numbers down 25% in 8 yrs; what 1st DNA census reveals
content: 'status of elephants in India: DNA-based Synchronous All-India Population Estimation of Elephants' (SAIEE 2021-25), estimated 22,446 elephants across India, down from 29,964 in 2017 . new DNA approach allows a far more accurate count by identifying individuals through their genetic signatures .

title: Legal breaks: Off-roading hits roadblock in Kashmir; FIR against social media influencer
content: police in central Kashmir registered the case under Indian Forest Act against Imad-ur-Rehman . a video surfaced showing youngsters driving Thar vehicles in the ecologically sensitive Brenwar forests of Pir Panjal mountains . the case was filed on a complaint from the forest department and several high-powered Mahindra Thar vehic .

title: LoC: Security forces foil infiltration bid in Kupwara; two terrorists gunned down
content: security forces foiled an infiltration bid along the Line of Control (LoC) in Kupwara district‚Äôs Keran sector . a large cache of weapons and equipment was seized from the site of the encounter . on October 13 evening, a joint team of the Army and J&K police had launched an anti-terror operation in Machhal sector based on intelligence inputs .

title: Apprentice in Andhra‚Äôs PR dept who went on to become Maoist‚Äôs principal voice
content: Sudhakar Reddy Udumula is the Editor (Investigation) at the Times of India, Hyderabad. Following the trail of migration and drought across the rustic landscape of Andhra Pradesh and Telangana, Sudhakar reported extensively on government apathy, divisive politics, systemic gender discrimination, agrarian crisis and the will to survive great odds. His curiosity for peeking behind the curtain triumphed over the criminal agenda of many scamsters in the highest political and corporate circles, making way for breaking stories such as Panama Papers Scam, Telgi Stamp Paper Scam, and many others. His versatility in reporting extended to red corridors of left-wing extremism where the lives of security forces and the locals in Maoist-affected areas were key points of investigation. His knack for detail provided crucial evidence of involvement from overseas in terrorist bombings in Hyderabad. Read More

title: Passan: Jorge Polanco has the Mariners on the way to a Hollywood ending
content: Jorge Polanco hits a go-ahead home run in the fifth inning to put the Mariners on top 6-3 . the "Top Gun Anthem" is an epic ballad filled with soaring guitar notes and pick-me-up vibes . it's the perfect soundtrack for this Mariners run, which sees them up two games to none .

title: Pickups: Vidal steps up; Dart, Darnold being underrated
content: fantasy managers must monitor their status for the upcoming week . each week, before the current NFL week ends, we will identify players available in at least 50% of ESPN standard leagues worthy of your attention . the NFL is a weekly league, and player valuation and roles seldom remain stagnant .

title: The race to the 2026 World Cup: Six more teams book their place at the finals
content: all confederations are drawing to a close, but we're still a long way from discovering the full list of 45 nations that will join hosts United States , Mexico and Canada to make up the field of 48 . the final two rounds of the group stage were played, when we discovered the seven nations that joined Morocco and Tunisia, plus interconfederation playoff contenders .

title: 'Trinidad Magic': Meet the Ole Miss breakout QB even his teammates hadn't heard of
content: the spring transfer portal opened for division II football players in April . co-offensive coordinator Charlie Weis Jr. was glued to the computer screen in his office . "we better get Coach Kiffin," one of them said .

title: What does Brian Callahan's firing mean for Cam Ward, 1-5 Titans?
content: the Titans fired coach Brian Callahan six games into the season . callahan worked with the likes of peyton Manning, Matthew Stafford , Derek Carr and Joe Burrow . the former Cincinnati Bengals offensive coordinator finished with a 3-14 record in his first season with second-year quarterback .

title: 14 can't-miss games to watch this November
content: it's a new era of sorts in examining the nonconference portion of the men's college basketball season . a diminished slate of traditional MTEs along with ever-expanding league schedules have combined to change the cadence of marquee matchups . the Big East has done away with both the Gavitt Games (vs. Big Ten) and a mini-challenge against the Big 12 .
